DOC.brief_summary: The aim study assess reliability Bispectral Index ( BIS Vista , Covidien ) neurosurgical patient . BIS value Loss Consciousness ( LOC ) , Post Intubation ( PI ) Return Consciousness ( ROC ) neurosurgical patient compare non-neurosurgical patient , routine anesthesia procedure .
DOC.criteria: BIS > 90 baseline ( awake ) ASA I II GSC < 15 anticipated difficult ventilation and/or intubation BMI > 30 surgical site allow BIS monitoring bilateral hearing loss speak Italian Language
